bilingual.target: 我们需要一个快捷的反应。

bilingual.source: The fight-or-flight response is a natural reaction to stress.
bilingual.target: 战斗或逃跑反应是对压力的自然反应。

bilingual.source: The response was proportionate to the threat.
The rapidity of his response saved the day.
bilingual.target: 他反应的迅速挽救了局面。
他的机敏反应让大家都很佩服。

bilingual.source: The galvanic response of the muscle was immediate.
bilingual.target: 肌肉的电流反应是立刻的。

bilingual.source: A high titer indicates a strong immune response.
bilingual.target: 高滴度表明强烈的免疫反应。

bilingual.source: The quick response prevented a major disaster.
bilingual.target: 快速反应阻止了一场重大灾难。

list.abstract: response是一个计算机专业术语。
response是一个英语单词，名词，作名词时意为“响应；反应；回答”。

yingyinNormal.en: Crying is a natural response to pain. I'm not crying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哭是疼痛的自然反应。我没在哭。

yingyinNormal.en: I should think that would call for some slight response on the part of the Kree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样应该会让克里帝国有点反应。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, please, that is such a lame excuse. I mean, that's a typical guy response.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，这个借口真烂，男生都是这种反应。

yingyinNormal.en: And the greater the risk of disease, the more intense your response will be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 染上疾病的风险越高，你身体的反应也会更激烈。

yingyinNormal.en: Here at the White House, my new Ebola response coordinator is working to ensure a seamless response across the federal government.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在白宫，新的埃博拉快速反应协调员正在工作，确保整个联邦政府可以做到无缝响应。

yingyinNormal.en: Upload the link. Return to LaGuardia. Now with an added 35-second delay in response time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开启传输，回到拉瓜迪亚机场，现在加上35秒的反应时间。

yingyinNormal.en: No. It's a involuntary response in their amygdala they can't help but be afraid of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的意思是这是杏仁体的一种下意识反应，他们控制不住害怕你。

yingyinNormal.en: Whenever an Alpha is killed, an automatic response is triggered. The Omega starts the day over again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一但α被杀，一种自动反应就会被触发，Ω就会重启当天。

yingyinNormal.en: Pupillary response is good. Smile is good. I'd fuck her. What's the problem? The guests wouldn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瞳孔反应正常，笑容正常，真想操她，有什么问题？游客不想。

yingyinNormal.en: Determining baseline fear levels in capuchin monkeys by measuring their response to visual stimuli.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过测定僧帽猴对视觉刺激的反应，确定他们的恐惧基线水平。

yingyinNormal.en: So? So, lack of a physiological response while lying is characteristic of a violent sociopath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以说？所以说，你撒谎时缺乏生理反应，这是反社会暴力狂的特点。

yingyinNormal.en: Before the patient was even diagnosed, we deployed one of our new CDC rapid response teams.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即便在病人被确诊之前，我们已经部署了一支我们新的疾控快速反应小组。

yingyinNormal.en: The CDC's new Ebola rapid response teams will deploy quickly to help hospitals implement the right protocols.
yingyinNormal.zh: 疾控中心新的快速反应小组将迅速部署，帮助各医院实施正确的方案。

yingyinNormal.en: Test subject D7, AKA Betsy, fear response study. Image number one: Frenchman on bicycle carrying baguettes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 测试D7，即Betsy恐惧反应研究，画面1: 骑车载着长面包的法国人。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't understand. If you were in a non-emotional relationship, then why are you having what appears to be an emotional response?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不明白，如果你们之间没有感情，怎么情绪反应得这么波动？

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I'm gonna look at some pictures to prompt an emotional response, and we'll see if the machine can identify them accurately.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会看一些照片，激发情绪反应，我们来看看这台机器能否准确识别。

yingyinNormal.en: But short of putting electrodes in your brain and monitoring your response to my companionship, this is the best I can do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但又不能插一个电极到你的大脑，探测你对我友谊问题的反应，就这方法还凑合了。

yingyinNormal.en: And as he performed, I looked around the audience, and I saw their faces and the look in their eyes and their response to his music and it was clear to me finally where the problem lay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他演出的时候，我看周围的观众，我看着他们的脸，他们的眼睛，他们对音乐的反应，很明显，我知道了。

yingyinNormal.en: He has a complicated response to authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对官僚的态度很复杂。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I'm not going to dignify that with a response.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想就此做出任何回应。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Epley found no significant gender difference in <highlight>responses</highlight>.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Although humans are more advanced and intelligent, animals are more genuine and authentic in their behavior and <highlight>responses</highlight> than human beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然人类更高级，更聪明，但动物的行为和反应比人类更真实可信。

examination_example.sentence: During critical situations, the outer core loses control and fails to regulate the impulses and instinctual <highlight>responses</highlight> coming from the primitive brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在危急情况下，外部核心失去控制，无法调节来自原始大脑的冲动和本能反应。

examination_example.sentence: A collection of dramatic videos and photos quickly spread across social media, attracting emotional <highlight>responses</highlight> from people all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一组激动人心的视频和照片迅速在社交媒体上传播开来，引起了世界各地人们的情感反应。

examination_example.sentence: The marketing strategy in <highlight>response</highlight> to this consumer demand has gone beyond articulating what is in a product.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 应对这种消费者需求的营销策略已经超越了阐明产品中的内容。

examination_example.sentence: The Malayalam is a crucial part of the brain that produces fear, anxiety and emotional <highlight>responses</highlight> including that sinking, guilty feeling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 杏仁核是大脑中产生恐惧、焦虑和情绪反应的关键部位，包括所产生的沮丧感和内疚感。

examination_example.sentence: This is a grand challenge for our age and it may require an "irrational" <highlight>response</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于我们这个时代来说这无疑是一个巨大的挑战，并且要用“非理性”的方式来应对。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: According to one study, students' academic performance is not the only decisive factor of their stress <highlight>responses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一项研究，学生的学习成绩并不是他们压力反应的唯一决定性因素。

examination_example.sentence: It was a <highlight>response</highlight> to the changing job market.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是对不断变化的就业市场的回应。

examination_example.sentence: We then looked at high school students' stress <highlight>responses</highlight> to daily social difficulties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我们观察了高中生对日常社交困难的压力反应。

examination_example.sentence: This is in <highlight>response</highlight> to rising air pollution that made Paris the most polluted city in the world for a brief time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是为了应对日益严重的空气污染，巴黎曾一度成为世界上污染最严重的城市。

examination_example.sentence: However, the spokesman of the supermarket said the store had taken strong action in <highlight>response</highlight> to incidents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，该超市发言人表示，该店已采取有力行动应对突发事件。

examination_example.sentence: In the rare cases we have seen bad behavior, we have taken strong action in <highlight>response</highlight>, including banning a customer from the store.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们看到不良行为的罕见情况下，我们采取了强有力的行动作为回应，包括禁止一名顾客进入商店。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Soul Machines' digital brain is a technological breakthrough because it  learns to make proper emotional <highlight>responses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 灵魂机器的数字大脑是一项技术突破，因为它学会了做出恰当的情绪反应。

examination_example.sentence: Recent research suggests that if an argument gets resolved, the emotional <highlight>response</highlight> tied to it is significantly reduced or almost completely erased.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的研究表明，如果一场争论得到解决，与之相关的情绪反应会显著降低或几乎完全消失。

examination_example.sentence: The tendency for universities to shape student behavior runs up against another characteristic of young adults: the <highlight>response</highlight> to being controlled by elders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大学塑造学生行为的倾向与年轻人的另一个特点相冲突：对受长辈控制的反应。

examination_example.sentence: He was able to say "chocolate" into his three-year-old son's ear without getting a <highlight>response</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他能够对着他三岁的儿子的耳朵说“巧克力”，却没有得到回应。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
